articles.content: Former Strictly Come Dancing professional AJ Pritchard has split with her girlfriend Abbie Quinnen. The 27-year-old reportedly ended their relationship last week after three years of dating and danci… [+1676 chars]

articles.author: Alex Green
articles.title: Sue Barker slams BBC's handling of her exit days after Mark Lawrenson complaints - The Mirror
articles.description: The Wimbledon legend, who also presented A Question of Sport, worked with the British Broadcasting Corporation for 24 years but stepped down altogether this year and has now criticised the manner of her exit
articles.content:
Sue Barker has said she "regrets" the manner in which her 24 years of hosting A Question Of Sport came to an end.
 The former professional tennis player and broadcaster, 66, criticised the way in wh… [+2100 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Trendell
articles.title: Björk: “First you create a universe with sound, then you move into it” - NME
articles.description: In her first NME cover interview in two decades, Björk talks new album ‘Fossora’, fungus and fighting sexism with Kate Bush
articles.content: “Its a sunny day here in Iceland, so its looking good! bursts Björk. Warmly energetic as she calls NME from her home in Reykjavík, she tells us what a wild Friday night looks like for her these days.… [+15326 chars]

articles.author: Laura Parkin
articles.title: Phil Collins and his Genesis bandmates sell the rights to their music for over $300million - Daily Mail
articles.description: The band, who first found fame in the 1970s and have sold more than 100million records, bid their fans farewell earlier this year, when they played their final show.
articles.content:
Phil Collins and his Genesis bandmates have sold the rights to their music for a figure over over $300million in a deal with record company Concord. 
The package deal includes songs from Phil's solo… [+3723 chars]
